name: eRS-CreateReferralAndSendForTriage-Operation-1
description: Create a referral for a patient and send it for triage at the selected service.

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: The NHS Number of the patient who the referral being created is for. Format: ^[0-9]{10}$

parameter.name: referringClinician
parameter.documentation: Required if and only if the logged in user has a role of Referring Clinician Admin.    Format: ^[0-9]{12}$

parameter.name: shortlist
parameter.documentation: When sending for triage, the shortlist must contain exactly one service, and this must support the ‘triage request flow’.

parameter.name: firstReminderFollowUpDays
parameter.documentation: This parameter triggers a reminder letter to the patient to prompt them to book an appointment if they haven’t done so after x days. When sending for triage, the only acceptable value is 0, which means no follow up letter will be sent, as the patient does not need to book an appointment.

parameter.name: intentionToAddReferralLetter
parameter.documentation: When sending for triage, a referral letter is always required; therefore the only acceptable value is NEED_TO_ADD_LATER.

parameter.name: referral
parameter.documentation: The referral request that will be created.
